availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Bennett D. Marks (Louisville, Kentucky, ice trader and notary public)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, ice trader and notary public. Ohio native. Married to Caroline D. Marks. Ice trader in Louisville in 1860. Partner of Marks & Co. in 1865. Notary public in Jefferson County in 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 4, p. 10; Find A Grave, "Bennett D. Marks (1839-1909)," Memorial #165128689, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=165128689&ref=acom (accessed June 1, 2017); KYR-0001-007-0377.
